application:
` tag contains the main settings for the app. We have set `android:allowBackup` to true, which enables backup and restore for the app. The `android:icon`, `android:label`, `android:roundIcon`, and `android:theme` attributes define the app's icon, label, round icon, and theme respectively.
The `` tag represents the main activity of the app, which is `.MainActivity`. We have added an `` to specify that this activity should be launched when the app is opened. The `` tag with the name "android.intent.action.MAIN" indicates that this is the main entry point of the app. The `` tag with the name "android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" specifies that this activity should appear in the launcher.
Please note that this code snippet is just a part of the complete AndroidManifest.xml file. You should include this code in the appropriate location within the file and make sure to include the necessary closing tags.
